Norway Lockdown

Norway’s lockdown now looked like steps too far. {#h.u04hl5tngfkp .zfr3Q .JYVBee dir=”ltr” style=”text-align: center;”}

Even the Norwegian Prime Minister admits that Sweden may have been right by not locking down!And Sweden is done with worrying about C19, they have maximized herd immunity, unlike everywhere else!
